table.name: box_models
table.remarks: Associates boxes with models. This determines which models are required for each box once sample processing is complete.

table.name: vw_boxes
table.viewSql: SELECT b.box_id, b.customer_id, o.organization_name AS customer_name, count(s.sample_id) AS samples, b.submitter_id, (((i.first_name)::text || ' '::text) || (i.last_name)::text) AS submitter_name, b.box_state_id, t.box_state_name, b.box_received_date, b.processing_complete_date, b.projected_complete_date FROM ((((sample.boxes b JOIN sample.box_states t ON ((b.box_state_id = t.box_state_id))) JOIN entity.individuals i ON ((b.submitter_id = i.entity_id))) JOIN entity.organizations o ON ((b.customer_id = o.entity_id))) LEFT JOIN sample.samples s ON ((b.box_id = s.box_id))) GROUP BY b.box_id, b.customer_id, o.organization_name, b.submitter_id, (((i.first_name)::text || ' '::text) || (i.last_name)::text), b.box_state_id, t.box_state_name, b.box_received_date, b.processing_complete_date, b.projected_complete_date;

table.name: vw_private_samples
table.viewSql: SELECT s.sample_id FROM ((sample.samples s LEFT JOIN sample.project_samples ps ON ((s.sample_id = ps.sample_id))) LEFT JOIN sample.projects p ON ((ps.project_id = p.project_id))) WHERE (p.is_private = true) GROUP BY s.sample_id HAVING (count(p.project_id) > 0);

table.name: vw_samples
table.viewSql: SELECT s.sample_id, s.box_id, b.customer_id, b.customer_name, b.box_state_name, b.box_state_id, b.submitter_name, s.site_id, si.site_name, si.latitude AS site_latitude, si.longitude AS site_longitude, si.us_state AS site_state, s.sample_date, date_part('year'::text, s.sample_date) AS sample_year, st_y((s.location)::geometry) AS sample_latitude, st_x((s.location)::geometry) AS sample_longitude, s.sample_time, s.type_id, st.sample_type_name AS sample_type, s.method_id, m.sample_method_name AS sample_method, s.habitat_id, h.habitat_name, s.area, s.field_split, s.lab_split, s.jar_count, s.qualitative, s.mesh, s.created_date, s.updated_date, s.qa_sample_id, p.diameter, p.sub_sample_count, p.tow_length, p.volume, p.aliquot, p.size_interval, p.tow_type, d.net_area, d.net_duration, d.stream_depth, d.net_depth, d.net_velocity, o.taxonomy_id, l.abbreviation AS life_stage, o.bug_size, o.split_count, o.big_rare_count, t.phylum, t.class, t.subclass, t."Order", t.family, t.genus, (pr.sample_id IS NOT NULL) AS is_private FROM (((((((((((sample.samples s JOIN sample.vw_boxes b ON ((s.box_id = b.box_id))) JOIN sample.sample_types st ON ((s.type_id = st.sample_type_id))) JOIN sample.sample_methods m ON ((s.method_id = m.sample_method_id))) JOIN geo.habitats h ON ((s.habitat_id = h.habitat_id))) LEFT JOIN geo.vw_sites si ON ((s.site_id = si.site_id))) LEFT JOIN sample.plankton p ON ((s.sample_id = p.sample_id))) LEFT JOIN sample.drift d ON ((s.sample_id = d.sample_id))) LEFT JOIN sample.organisms o ON ((s.sample_id = o.sample_id))) LEFT JOIN taxa.vw_taxonomy_crosstab t ON ((o.taxonomy_id = t.taxonomy_id))) LEFT JOIN sample.vw_private_samples pr ON ((s.sample_id = pr.sample_id))) LEFT JOIN taxa.life_stages l ON ((o.life_stage_id = l.life_stage_id)));
